subject: Football
lead_paragraph: Over the course of three seasons in the N.F.L, Saints running back Reggie Bush has been lauded and written off a number of times based on his immense talent and remarkable inconsistency.
snippet: Over the course of three seasons in the N.F.L, Saints running back Reggie Bush has been lauded and written off a number of times based on his immense talent and remarkable inconsistency.
